slides.script: I forgot my best friend's birthday...for the third year in a row. I felt like the worst friend ever.

slides.script: Stress and anxiety were taking over my life. I was forgetting important dates, losing my keys constantly, and struggling to focus at work. I felt like I was letting everyone down.

slides.script: I thought this was just a normal part of getting older. But then I discovered a hidden truth: chronic stress was literally shrinking my brain. While I was struggling, an ancient herb held the secret to restoring my mental clarity.

slides.script: My sister, a naturopath, told me about ashwagandha. This "royal herb" has been used in Ayurvedic medicine for over 6,000 years to relieve stress and sharpen focus. Modern studies back up its brain-boosting power.

slides.script: Ashwagandha's stress-busting effects have been confirmed by over 200 scientific studies. It's even been shown to regrow brain cells and reverse memory loss. But quality is crucial - it must be organic, full-spectrum, and clinically-dosed.
